name: Circle Rally Party
description: Circle Rally Party is a 1 to 4 players local multiplayer party game with mini games about doing donuts with cars. Use your car's unique attack at the right time, and collect power-ups to improve your odds. Traffic rules do not apply!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 (32-bit or 64-bit) Processor: Intel i3 2.0Ghz or any equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated graphics card Storage: 275 MB available space Sound Card: any Additional Notes: XBox (360, One) or PlayStation controller
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 (32-bit or 64-bit) Processor: Intel i5-7xxx 2.5Ghz or any equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 650 or AMD Radeon HD7770 or any equivalent Storage: 275 MB available space Sound Card: any Additional Notes: XBox (360, One) controller recommended
